document_data.caption: A map of Mulhorand showing Nezras to the east.
document_data.name: Nezras
document_data.mainbody: '''Nezras''' was a village located near the eastern border of the country of [[Mulhorand]] during the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B1dlc}}
document_data.Geography: Nezras lay along the eastern foothills of the [[Sword Mountains (Mulhorand)|Sword Mountains]] on the fringes of both the [[Plains of Purple Dust]] and [[Fuirgar]]. The [[Lonely Lake]] was located due north of the village.
document_data.Inhabitants: Nezras was inhabited by a group of [[wizard]]s descended from the mighty [[Nezram]] in the {{YearlinkName|1357}}.
